metadata.name: The Pepe-Signal
metadata.description:
The Pepesignal is a distress signal device appearing in the various interpretations of the Pepe mythos. It is a specially modified Klieg searchlight with a stylized symbol of Pepeman's face attached to the light so that it projects a large Pepe face emblem on the sky or buildings of Gotham City.

In the stories, the signal is used by the Gotham City Police Department as a method of contacting and summoning Pepeman to their assistance in the event of a serious crisis and as a weapon of psychological intimidation to the numerous villains of Gotham City.

Due to the dire threat to Gotham city, Batman himself calls Pepeman and asks for his assistance.

Will Pepeman come to save them?
Only time will tell us!

Size: 1920X1080 High resolution video.

Happy Bidding!
